image.alt: Smiling family with confident smiles in a modern orthodontic office

paragraphs.text: Caring and trusted orthodontics in Lake Oswego. At Dischinger & Sessions Orthodontic Team we provide family-friendly, individualized care for patients of all ages. Our practice combines modern appliances, three-dimensional imaging, and years of clinical experience to create efficient, comfortable treatment plans.

We use systems such as Damon braces and Spark clear aligners to reduce visit frequency and improve comfort. Schedule a complimentary consultation to review x-rays, photos, and a personalized treatment plan.

items.title: World-class Technology
items.text: We use up-to-date systems—Damon self-ligating braces, Spark clear aligners, and 3D imaging—to improve comfort and efficiency.

items.title: Fewer Appointments

image.alt: Convenient scheduling and fewer office visits

items.text: Modern workflows and appliances are selected to reduce in‑office visits while keeping close clinical oversight.

items.title: Shorter Treatment Time

image.alt: Comfortable orthodontic care with efficient appliances

items.text: Low‑friction mechanics and efficient aligner materials can shorten treatment with gentler forces for greater comfort.

items.title: Flexible Payments
items.text: Free initial consultation and in‑office financing options make quality care accessible.

paragraphs.text: Bill M. Dischinger, DMD, is founder and lead clinician. Dr. Dischinger has advanced training in airway‑focused and light‑force orthodontics and extensive experience with the Damon System. He integrates 3D cone beam imaging for airway evaluation and emphasizes individualized, comfortable care.

Dr. Jeff Sessions is a board‑certified orthodontist with decades of clinical experience. He focuses on technology‑driven care, including digital scanning, 3D X‑ray imaging, and 3D printing for precise treatment planning. He is active in professional organizations and brings an evidence‑based approach to complex cases.

Dr. Sara Edmondson is a board‑certified orthodontist and diplomate of the American Board of Orthodontics who contributes clinical expertise to the practice. Her training and clinical focus support comfortable, high‑quality care for patients of all ages.

image.alt: Dr. Sara Edmondson headshot not available

paragraphs.text: We offer a range of options—from Damon braces to Spark clear aligners—plus early interceptive care and airway‑focused evaluation using 3D imaging to support healthy growth and long‑term results.

image.alt: Orthodontic care for children and early evaluation

testimonials.author: Jonah M
testimonials.testimonial: “Dr. Bill and the whole team are wonderful! We were blown away by the extra care that is put into all the details of the office... My son has the Spark (invisible) braces and we are about 6 months into treatment. We can already see great results and he is smiling more often!... I would highly recommend Dischinger Orthodontics to anyone!”

testimonials.author: Elise Kirkpatrick
testimonials.testimonial: “Dr. Bill, Dr Sarah, Suzie and the entire staff have been 'most excellent' supporting and guiding me during my two year Spark aligners journey. Dr. Bill answered my many initial questions and concerns and always responds promptly...”

testimonials.author: N Corbett
testimonials.testimonial: “The staff here is truly amazing and caring at every visit, making the entire process so much more comfortable. Dr. Bill is not only a skilled orthodontist but also incredibly nice and funny...”

og_meta.description: Dischinger & Sessions Orthodontic Team provides modern, family-friendly orthodontics in Lake Oswego, OR. Damon braces, Spark clear aligners, airway-focused care

image.alt: Dischinger Orthodontics team smiling in a bright office lobby

paragraphs.text: Providing spectacular smiles through customized orthodontics in Lake Oswego is at the heart of what we do. We deliver individualized, family-friendly care using modern technology, clear communication, and treatment plans built around each patient’s lifestyle.

Our practice uses proven appliances and digital workflows—including Damon self-ligating braces, Spark clear aligners, and 3D imaging (CBCT / i-CAT)—to plan treatment more precisely and comfortably for children, teens, and adults.

We make care simple and transparent with a complimentary consultation that includes photos and X-rays, upfront all-inclusive pricing, and 0% interest payment plans so families can choose the option that fits their budget.
From early airway and growth assessments to finishing touches, we focus on evidence-based, patient-centered treatment that balances long-term health with the confident smile you want to share.

image.alt: Dr. Bill Dischinger smiling in the office

paragraphs.text: Bill M. Dischinger, DMD is the founder and senior orthodontist at Dischinger Orthodontics. He is recognized for his expertise in airway-centered orthodontics and complex treatment planning, and he lectures internationally on advanced orthodontic techniques and digital workflows.
Dr. Dischinger integrates 3D imaging, light-force mechanics, and modern appliances such as the Damon System and Spark aligners to create individualized plans for patients of all ages.

Dr. Jeff Sessions is a board-certified orthodontist and a long-time member of the Dischinger practice. A native Oregonian, he brings more than three decades of clinical experience and a deep commitment to patient-focused care.
He stays current with progressive research and technology, applying digital scanning, 3D X-ray imaging, and evidence-based methods to improve treatment predictability and patient comfort.

Dr. Sessions holds advanced academic credentials, including a Master of Science in Dentistry with a focus on growth and development. He is an active member of the American Association of Orthodontists and the American Dental Association.
Dr. Sara Edmondson is a board-certified orthodontist and a diplomate of the American Board of Orthodontics who contributes additional expertise to the Dischinger team.
She provides comprehensive orthodontic care for patients of all ages, applying modern appliances and digital tools to tailor treatment plans to each patient’s needs.

Site materials identify Dr. Edmondson as board-certified and experienced in clinical orthodontics. Specific degree institutions and dates were not listed in the provided materials; we can add those details once they are available.

Get Started.title: What to expect at your first visit

paragraphs.text: Your complimentary consultation includes photos, orthodontic X‑rays (records), a complete oral exam and a smile assessment. You’ll meet one‑on‑one with an orthodontist and our treatment coordinator to review findings and possible treatment options.

How to get started: book a complimentary consultation with no hidden fees and no obligation. Bring your insurance card if you have coverage; a referral is not required. Our Lake Oswego office can help with directions and parking information.

image.alt: Dr Bill Dischinger consulting with a patient

paragraphs.text: Transparent pricing and all‑inclusive costs help you plan your care. We offer customized payment plans to fit most budgets, with 0% interest in‑house financing available on select plans.
We accept most major insurance plans and file claims electronically for your convenience. To schedule by phone, call (503) 635-4439.

Complete your new patient paperwork online or when you arrive. Use our online form to submit basic details and request your free consultation, or visit the appointment URL to begin the intake process.
Online form fields include: Patient Name*, Parent Name (optional), Email*, Phone*, Message, plus reCAPTCHA. You’ll also see an SMS consent checkbox and links to Privacy and Terms near the form.

og_meta.title: Get Started | Dischinger Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Start your orthodontic journey with a complimentary consultation at Dischinger Orthodontics. Access patient forms and schedule at our Lake Oswego office.

image.alt: Child smiling with parent at orthodontic office

paragraphs.text: Traditional metal braces remain a reliable, time-tested option. Metal brackets and wires are adjusted over time to correct severe crowding and complex bite issues, giving consistent, predictable results.

The Damon System uses self-ligating brackets that reduce friction and often shorten treatment time. Patients typically enjoy fewer adjustment visits and clear or ceramic options for a more discreet look.

Clear aligners are removable, discreet, and comfortable. Spark and similar aligners use advanced materials for reliable force retention; trays are replaced regularly and allow easier brushing, flossing, and dining during treatment.

Appliances can address bite problems and airway concerns. The practice discusses traditional palatal expanders and modern light‑force approaches, noting that in many cases contemporary methods allow arch development with fewer side effects.

Orthodontic care can be part of a plan to ease TMJ pain by improving bite alignment and reducing joint stress. Relief timelines vary, often taking 12 to 24 months depending on the condition and chosen treatment.

A properly fitted mouth guard protects your teeth and appliances during sports. We check fit at appointments and advise on cleaning, storage, and replacement to keep protection consistent throughout treatment.
An orthodontic evaluation by age seven lets us guide jaw growth and development, often simplifying or shortening treatment later. Early intervention targets problems when they are easier to correct.

image.alt: Young patient smiling during orthodontic visit

paragraphs.text: When jaw irregularities require surgery, we coordinate closely with oral surgeons to plan orthodontics and surgery together for improved function, balance, and facial harmony.

paragraphs.text: Find clear answers to common questions about orthodontic treatments, airway-focused care, scheduling, and payment options from The Dischinger & Sessions Orthodontic Team.

We provide traditional braces, self‑ligating systems like the Damon braces, and clear aligners such as Spark. Treatment is customized to your goals and may include retainers and adjuncts like vibration therapy to improve comfort and efficiency.

accordion.header: How do I get started and how long will treatment take?

paragraphs.text: Begin with a free consultation that includes an exam and X‑rays. Treatment length varies, but many patients complete care in about 12–24 months. We’ll provide a personalized timeline at your first appointment.

accordion.header: Braces vs clear aligners: which is right for me?

paragraphs.text: Clear aligners are removable and discreet, often ideal for mild to moderate alignment. Braces, including self‑ligating options, are better suited for more complex tooth or bite movements. Your orthodontist will recommend the option that matches your clinical needs and lifestyle.

We screen for airway and sleep issues such as snoring and daytime fatigue. Treatments may include arch expansion, appliances to advance the jaw, and targeted therapies for TMJ symptoms. Complex cases sometimes require 3D imaging or collaboration with sleep specialists.

We offer transparent, all‑inclusive pricing, flexible financing (including 0% in‑house options), and accept many dental insurances. To schedule, call (503) 635-4439 or book online: https://dischingerteam.com/free-consult/.
